abstract: The company created its Amazon Appstore app for Android shoppers, but it has now released the Amazon Underground app to provide access to its digital goods.
snippet: The company created its Amazon Appstore app for Android shoppers, but it has now released the Amazon Underground app to provide access to its digital goods.
lead_paragraph: Q. Do you have to have one of Amazon’s Fire tablets to use its Amazon app store, or do I have other shopping options besides Google Play?

headline.main: Shopping for Amazon Apps With Android
headline.print_headline: Shopping for Amazon Apps With Android
